Bradley, Todd wrote:

> I certainly was not saddened by the announcement.  I use Eclipse (for
> "interactive" test runs) and ant (for continuous integration tests,
> etc.) and have never used the GUI test runner even once.  I don't feel
> like I'm missing anything.  If people like to have a GUI test runner,
> how about making one and putting it in the JUnit add-ons area of
> junit.org?
>
That would be fine as well -- the most important thing is to have it 
available.

-- 
Jason Rogers
